# AVPlayer.Status.failed

**Case**

A value that indicates the player can no longer play media due to an error.

## Declaration

```swift
case failed
```

## Discussion

Inspect the value of the player’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer/error] property to determine the details of the failure.

## Status values

- **AVPlayer.Status.unknown**: A value that indicates a player hasn’t attempted to load media for playback.
- **AVPlayer.Status.readyToPlay**: A value that indicates the player is ready to media.
